definitions.text: highly complex or intricate and occasionally devious; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; - Sir Walter Scott
examples: Byzantine methods for holding on to his chairmanship
got his way by labyrinthine maneuvering
Oh, what a tangled web we weave

definitions.text: marked by repeated turns and bends
examples: a tortuous road up the mountain
winding roads are full of surprises
had to steer the car down a twisty track
